text: Antón Arieta-Araunabeña Piedra (6 January 1946 – 7 May 2022), known as Arieta, was a Spanish footballer. He played as a striker. He was born in Durango, Spain. He played for the Spain national football team from 1970 until 1972, making seven appearances. Arieta died on 7 May 2022 at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish footballers
title: Antón Arieta
